content:
published  May  

West Bank dwellers will find cement trucks and orange construction signs a common sight during the next four weeks PERIOD
The twentieth Avenue South bridge over Interstate  will close Monday for resurfacing PERIOD
The bridge is adjacent to the CedarRiverside neighborhood the Universitys West Bank Augsburg College and several University contract parking lots PERIOD
Construction will reroute traffic down Cedar Avenue and Seventh Street South PERIOD
Project supervisor Leon Lillie said the bridge is structurally sound but officials deemed an additional concrete overlay necessary to extend the crossings life span PERIOD
Built in  the bridges average daily traffic is about  vehicles PERIOD
Thirty years is a long period of time for a bridge Lillie said PERIOD
Resurfacing should eliminate the need for any maintenance for the next  to  years Lillie said PERIOD
The bridges sidewalks will remain open for pedestrian traffic throughout construction PERIOD
Officials said construction will not affect traffic on I94 PERIOD
Weather permitting the project is expected to be complete by midJune PERIOD
 Michelle Moriarity
